# iosxr_vty_pool (Resource)

This resource can manage the VTY Pool configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_vty_pool" "example" {
  default_first_vty     = 0
  default_last_vty      = 10
  default_line_template = "default"
  eem_first_vty         = 100
  eem_last_vty          = 105
  eem_line_template     = "EEM_TEMPLATE"
  pools = [
    {
      pool_name     = "USER_POOL"
      first_vty     = "20"
      last_vty      = "30"
      line_template = "USER_TEMPLATE"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `default_first_vty` (Number) Default VTY Pool.
- `default_last_vty` (Number) Last VTY number
  - Range: `4`-`99`
- `default_line_template` (String) Name of line template
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `eem_first_vty` (Number) eem VTY Pool.
  - Range: `100`-`100`
- `eem_last_vty` (Number) Last VTY number
  - Range: `105`-`105`
- `eem_line_template` (String) Name of line template
- `pools` (Attributes List) First VTY number (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--pools))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--pools"></a>
### Nested Schema for `pools`

Required:

- `pool_name` (String) Name of user defined VTY Pool

Optional:

- `first_vty` (String) First VTY number
- `last_vty` (String) Last VTY number
- `line_template` (String) Name of line template

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_vty_pool.example ""
```
